{"id":1148838723,"question_id":50,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1705500049,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1148838723/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"6.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double solve(double x,long long int n){\n        if(n==0){\n            return 1;\n        }\n        else if(n<=0){\n            return solve(1/x,-1*n);\n        }\n        else{\n            if(n%2==0){\n                return solve(x*x,n/2);\n            }\n            else{\n                return x*solve(x*x,(n-1)/2);\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        return solve(x,n);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
